info.description:
|exa logo| *A framework for data processing, computation, and
visualization*

Installation
============

| |conda Badge|
| |pypi badge|
| Exa is available through
  `anaconda <https://www.continuum.io/downloads>`__

::

    $ conda install -c exaanalytics exa

or `pypi <https://pypi.python.org/pypi>`__.

::

    $ pip install exa

Getting Started
===============

| |docs|
| |gitter|
| Building the docs requires
  `sphinx <http://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/stable>`__.

::

    $ cd docs
    $ make html           # .\make.bat html

Development
===========

|Travis-CI| |AppVeyor| |Coveralls| |Codacy Badge|

For a development ready installation:

::

    $ git clone https://github.com/exa-analytics/exa.git
    $ cd exa
    $ pip install -e .

Reference
=========

|DOI|
